name: Tree-Off!
description:
Tree-Off! is my first solo game. I made it over the course of 2 months. The constraint was that it had to be a one button game, finishable in 3 minutes, built with Unity 2D mode.

You play as a treant defending an off-screen village from hordes of skateboard-riding skeletons and giant golems by hitting them with carefully measured golf swings.

I know.

Music : Another World - MASTER BOOT RECORD
